channel.title: ScapeRune V17.8 (CONFIGURATION! NEW MINIGAMES!)
channel.description:
[B]READ BELOW![/B]
ScapeRune is now for begginers! With an easy to use configuration file, start your own server running our efficant base in under 5 minutes!
[b]HIGHLY [U]RECOMMENDED[/U] FOR BEGGINERS[/b]
[B]Info[/B] When the server was up ran 150+ players ALL TIMES max we'd ever reached 403!
[B]WATCH THE VIDEO OF SOME OF IT'S FEATURES![/B] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ckwIHQXsAw
[B]PK Videos (Shows many features and how insanely fun the server was)[/B] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_0uhBHs1u1g http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5bfVFg31gjs&fmt=18&annotation_id=annotation_383527&feature=iv
Also look for others on youtube :P
[B]Downloads[/B]
[b]Version 17.8 Source - 100% Open[/b] (SUPER FAST!) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?w3y1wnnmjmm]http://www.mediafire.com/?w3y1wnnmjmm[/url]
[b]Version 3.2 Client - 100% Open[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?3zgzmhntj41]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?3zgzmhntj41[/url]
[b]Features:[/b]
[ul][*]Stable [*]Anti-Flood [*]Impossible to go offline [*]Custom models [*]PK Points System [*]PK Point Shop [*]Shops [*]NPC Dialogue [*]Rep System (Shows skull) [*]Donator rank [*]Custom item specials [*]Log in interface [*]NPC VS. PLAYER Combat [*]PLAYER VS. PLAYER Combat (It's 150% like RuneScape. Even better now. ;)) [*]All buttons handled [*]Server Console [*]Player Saving [*]Character Design [*]Custom gfx [*]Fletching [*]All ancient magic works (no farcast) [*]All ancient magic works (with farcast) [*]Some normal magic [*]Veng [*]Veng other [*]Stat view [*]Ready to add custom anims. [*]Jad Minigame (firecape, other drag items) [*]Mithril PK (get bender swords, other drag items) [*]Has a PK economy (Meaning you PK for items, pk points, and cash) [*]Basic commands [*]Custom teleports [*]Avatar bending skills [*]Bounty Hunter [*]Edge 1v1 [*]Mage Bank [*]Varrock Team PK [*]Dragon Claws 4 hit spec [*]NPC Cave (get npc drops here) [*]Dragon Claws operate [*]Dragon fire shield spec (on operate) [*]Special power of the dragon claws move (after beating jad minigame) [*]Working AFK. (Timer set at 1 minute, 30 seconds) [*]Skillcape emotes [*]Normal emotes [*]Air guitar uses PK Points and does an electric music move. [*]Weapon sounds [*]Special attack sounds [*]Custom weapons sounds [*]Duel Arena (with staking) [*]Easy to start out [*]Clan chat (Only 50%) [*]Administrator + Moderator crowns [*]PVP Drops [*]Only Admin+ can use ::item [*]Dharok effect [*]Verac effect [*]God wars dungeon (get godswords from here) [*]KBD with magic + melee (get d claws from here) [*]Starter package (only can get one per user) [*]One connection per IP [*]Range Void Effects [*]Melee Void Effects [*]Mage Void Effects [*]D Bow Effects [*]Working Range Projectiles [*]Working Magic Projectiles [*]Fletching [*]Guthan Effect [*]Nazi Zombie Minigame [*]Summoning [*]Almost 100% all magics[/ul]
[b]What we Updated:[/b]
[ul][*]Easy to use Configuration! [*]Jad minigame! [*]Everything works and new commands! [*]Equiptment glitch FIXED! [*]New auto character saving system! (Credits to Jinrake) [*]More economic![/ul]
[b]Updated Pictures:[/b]
[img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/config.png[/img] [img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/defender1.png[/img] [img]http://i742.photobucket.com/albums/xx64/canownueasy3/defender2.png[/img]
WAIT A COUPLE MINS IM MAKING THEM NOW! :D
[size=15][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
(People in developement team) - Canownueasy: Starting the project, programming, managing the project, hosting the server - Max: Server base, programming - Gert (google Coder): Huge stability improvements
(People not in developement team) - Gravediggah: Many features, me and Max just converted to fit our base - Encouragin: Beggining server base - Palidino76: The starting point of every 508
[size=15][b]Comment & Rep[/b][/size] Our team worked extremely hard to create this server.
We really want to see some new servers with this base. (Considering it is extremely stable)
[img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/Multi-Cast.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/bendingspells.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/checkpkpoints.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/clanchat.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/death.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/dharok.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/dragonclaws.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/katsu.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/newdclaw.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/newdclawspec.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/newfriends.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/pkpointshop1.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/range.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/specialattacks.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/summoning.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/train.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/vestasword.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/zombie1.png[/img] [img]http://i736.photobucket.com/albums/xx2/toplistpics/zombie2.png[/img] [img]http://i560.photobucket.com/albums/ss43/forscaperune/modern.png[/img] [img]http://i560.photobucket.com/albums/ss43/forscaperune/lunars.png[/img] [img]http://i560.photobucket.com/albums/ss43/forscaperune/ancients.png[/img]

item.title: ScapeRune V17.8 (CONFIGURATION! NEW MINIGAMES!)
item.dc:creator: @im_not_rich im not rich
item.description:
@im_not_rich wrote:

White screen fix: just close the AUTO SAVER.
Saving fix: just relog to save…

but guys it’s not worth downloading this… when ingame… EVERYTHING is mixed… if u wear fletching cape then it has the look as a slayer cape (t), wear ranged cape (t) then it’s an staff of air…? if you wear rune crossbow its left handed but in a very… strange position…trading one of the “shop” “owners” makes you teleport to stupid random places… character files come as chinese text (wierd enough not every time…) teleporting home forces you to relog because you wont see any of the teleports then… thieving teleports you then disconnecs you…
attacking the “zombies” closes your client…
WANT ME TO GO ON?
Sadly enough, not worth it to download.
And don’t fucking flame me like " you can’t code or you would know how to fix" or “this is called the magic configuration”
because this source is just all fucked up.
I’d rather die then fixing that all, that’s like impossible…
i see the reason that you’d like to get rid of it rofl. No way i would rep (if i could, LMAO).
Guys im just telling this all because i want to spare you guys of months work while you could code a complete 508 which would even take less time then fixing this PIECE OF SHIT. Thanks and YW.

Read full topic

item.title: ScapeRune V17.8 (CONFIGURATION! NEW MINIGAMES!)
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

Please respond as fast as possible.
I’m new to 508 servers , I’ve been coding 317 since months. I download a 317… run the client and source , and it works. But when I download ScapeRune Client and Source it doesnt work. What I mean by it doesnt work is that I click the client and it doesnt load all the way it just gets stuck at “Connecting to update server” on the cmd prompt it says error_game_js5connect.
There is another problem too , when I run the server then click on the client , The client just turns all white. Please Help

Read full topic
